description:
Welcome back our local fitness model, Holly Heart. Today we put all that hard work, training and physical endurance to the test.
Only wrists and ankles are tied, no other support. Hogties are difficult enough, but done like this it is an outright abuse to the body. As if the bondage was not enough, we add an ass hook and tie it off to Holly's hair. The strain on the neck is almost unbearable to endure.
Foot caning and a few other BDSM techniques are used on Holly, all with great effect. However the Orgasms we rip from her body are earth shaking and extract a heavy toll on Holly's mental state and endurance. After a few brutal orgasms Holly is done but the suffering continues well past what even Holly thinks she can handle.
title: Local fitness model suffers the most horrific, painful bondage suspension there is.
